channel.title: [PI - 317]Vesta Longsword and Statius's Hammer Problems [PI]
channel.description:
Ok guys, here's my problem and I can't fix it.
The vesta longsword and statius hammer are messed up in my server, this may be a client issue but no one reads client issues....
info: the weapon is not showing up, but the inventory icon is. Statius hammer makes me invisible Vesta longsword isn't visible.
my old client worked and it showed it but this one doesn't (my webclient one) (it is a different one) Info on client: devotionpk client
used to use fallen pkers v3 client.
HERES WHAT I DID:
I copied itemdefs from other client and it didn't do anything:
so can anyone give me models and ITEMDEFS (not class8s) itemdefs only made for 317.
PLEASE!

item.title: [PI - 317]Vesta Longsword and Statius's Hammer Problems [PI]
item.dc:creator: @deathe1000 deathe1000
item.description:
@deathe1000 wrote:

Ok guys, here’s my problem and I can’t fix it.

The vesta longsword and statius hammer are messed up in my server, this may be a client issue but no one reads client issues…

info: the weapon is not showing up, but the inventory icon is.
Statius hammer makes me invisible
Vesta longsword isn’t visible.

my old client worked and it showed it but this one doesn’t (my webclient one) (it is a different one)

devotionpk client

used to use fallen pkers v3 client.
